display_notes: We estimate the impact of mode shifting freight based on costs associated with freight transport in the US ($0.86/mtkm by air; $0.11/mtkm by truck; 0.03/mtkm by rail, and $0.02/mtkm by water) and adjust to LAC (US BTS, 2022). We exclude fuel costs, assuming they account for 10% of the total cost.
